name: Initiative Media
overview: Initiative Media operates as a media, marketing, and digital company. Its services include planning, buying, innovation, research, results/accountability, and client management. The company also provides consultancy services on the brand association values from investment in sports and entertainment. Its customers include automotive, beverage, entertainment, restaurants, financial services, travel/leisure, consumer goods, retail, technology, and pharmaceutical. The company was formerly known as Western Initiative Media Worldwide and changed its name to Initiative Media Inc. in October, 1998. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in New York, New York. It has additional offices in North America, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia Pacific. Initiative Media Inc. operates as a subsidiary of The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc.
